notes.short: A classic 7-segment display, with 4 dots and column.

packets.name: status_code
packets.description:
Reports the current state or error status of the device. ``code`` is a standardized value from 
the JACDAC error codes. ``vendor_code`` is any vendor specific error code describing the device
state. This report is typically not queried, when a device has an error, it will typically
add this report in frame along with the announce packet.

packets.name: digits
packets.description:
Each byte encodes the display status of a digit using a ``GFEDCBA`` encoding. 
If incoming ``digits`` data is smaller than available, the remaining digits will be cleared. Thus, sending an empty ``digits`` payload clears the screen.

```text
 - A -
 |   |
 G   B
 |   |
 - F -
 |   |   -
 E   C  |DP|
 - D -   -
```

packets.name: brightness
packets.description: Controls the brightness of the LEDs. ``0`` means off.

packets.name: double_dots
packets.description: Turn on or off the column leds in of the segment. If the column leds is not supported, the value remains false.

packets.name: digit_count
packets.description: The number of digits available on the display.
